long_description: Discover the difference quality cookware can make with this REI Campware nonstick frypan. Hard-anodized aluminum with Teflon(R) Classic nonstick interior hardens the cooking surface for excellent abrasion resistance. Anodizing process occurs after the application of the nonstick surface, fully coating the frypan for even heat distribution and increased durability. Handle locks securely in place while cooking and folds away for easy packing. Spiral pattern on the bottom grips stove and grill top.
short_description: Discover the difference quality cookware can make with this REI Campware nonstick frypan.
